sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.InstanceScanUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>InstanceScanUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var InstanceScanUtil = Class.create();
InstanceScanUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	hasTableAccess: function(tableName, accessType) {
		var gsm = GlideSecurityManager.get();
		return gsm.hasRightsTo("record/" + tableName + "/" + accessType, null);
	},

	findingHasMuteRule: function(finding) {
		return(new GlideRecord('scan_mute_rule').get(finding.scan_mute_rule));
	},
	
    type: 'InstanceScanUtil'
};

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-05 22:24:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5d88e4947333330094a410c92bf6a74e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>InstanceScanUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Instance Scan" source="com.glide.instance_scan">4774c54f6da620100acb70b353433068</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5d88e4947333330094a410c92bf6a74e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-09 03:15:21</sys_updated_on>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
